roleset.name: to cause to become
roleset.note: RENDER-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No VNcls. (from render.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [The water]-1 destroyed about $ 75 million in currency and caked $ 4 million of coins with mud , [*]-1 rendering them dangerous to counting machines .

roleset.name: to give, provide, giving
roleset.note: RENDER-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. Member of Vncls give-13.1. (from render.02-v)
RENDITION-N NOTES: Expanded by Julia based on BOLT. Corresponds to VNcls give-13.1. (from rendition.01-n)

example.name: passive
example.text: Naturally , neither General Dynamics nor Dassault could be expected to hamper its prospective future dealings by making disclosures of sums paid ( or not ) to various Greek officials for services-1 rendered [*] -1 .

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: International law prohibits the "rendition" of prisoners to countries if the possibility of mistreatment can be anticipated.

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: The Gibson inquiry will look into allegations Britain's secret services were complicit in the torture and rendition of terror detainees, such as at Guant?namo Bay

roleset.name: to translate
roleset.note: RENDER-V NOTES: Based on WSJ. No Vncls. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from render.03-v)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Assuming modern audiences readily understand that Moliere 's social indictment covers their world as well as 17th-century Paris , [Mr. Wilbur]-1 concentrated his formidable artistry on [*-1]rendering the Alexandrine French verse into sprightly and theatrical English iambic pentameter .
example.arg: into sprightly and theatrical English iambic pentameter

example.name: art frame
example.text: In this early example of Indian painting in an Ajanta cave, the artist rendered the sensuous form of the richly attired bodhisattva with gentle gradations of color and delicate highlights and shadows .
example.arg: In this early example of Indian painting in an Ajanta cave
the sensuous form of the richly attired bodhisattva
with gentle gradations of color and delicate highlights and shadows
